attributes.action: Ban smoking in cars when children are present
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I cannot understand how people can do this to their children, sacrificing thier kids health in order to satisfy their own cravings, I have seen people in their cars with all the windows closed, puffing away on their cigerettes with two or three young childen some of them no more than new born. now this cant be right and should have been banned years ago, surely parents should know this is not right but it seems that they need to be told forcefully by banning it.
